trends: There have been 33 other sightings in Maricopa
There were no other sightings in Maricopa on or around November 30th 1995
Summary: multiple witnesses and evenings when multiple "lights" would collect in the SW sky (toward Yuma)..
divs: sighting detailsthat winter was wierd..along with the comet that had been visible by eye we all (in town too) we bagn to see large (relative to stars) lights hanging in the sky toward yuma. friends one night videoed them b\c it was at suk..other times it would be later.... my husband could see them many nights on the drive along the maricopa highway toward out place on vekol wash and papago roads. one moonless night i took my kids out in the desert on a dirt road about three miles toward the lights, it was moonless and after about ten minutes of realizing we were all alone out there we were suddenly gripped with fear and headed home! the lights were no more "readable" at that distance, so they must have been far away. they were most often seen about 10-40 degress off the horizon and visible as soon as the sun began to set. we all tried to come up with military explanations - research flare technology..could these be hanging flares or something so bright so far away? they often seemed in formation, like a huge arc, so we assumed somehow the flares were tied together or something. these lights would eventually "go away" - or just dissapear and se we thought perhaps the flares just extinguish? however, sometimes there would be a whole "string" of lights and others just one..or two, and there was movement between them...so flares with little heliocopter motors we thought! that winter was acoompanied by a lot of jet fly over - some in town thought a war was brewing it was so hightened and that there must be war games or something at the airforce base toward yuma.... of course the following year the phoenix lights were witnessed by many and it was very similar to what we were seeing maricopa and in the sonoran - around ak-chin rez..... why report now ten years later? i just saw the very thoughful documentary "i know what i saw" and feel like information... even this which seems so basically "nothing" is mounting and perhaps somewhere this will be explained. i will check to see if i took video or any photos. i do recall we got a small telescope set up to try and see better...but again just huge round lights... no smoke or any flare type signs though..... i recall the name of the person who did take video in town...i had pulled in their house on the way home, exclaiming...they were already in backyard filming! it was a vhs camcorder if i recall - so perhaps the quality no better than the hundreds of "lights" video. in the end we could never see a solid body or craft...just these amazing lights... in total we witnessed this perhaps two dozen times over that winter...from about christmas to march or so.... i moved that summer and missed the phoenix lights thing the next year...except what was reported.
